Class OPLVoting

  • java.lang.Object
    • OPLVoting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogUtil

    public class OPLVoting
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogUtil
    This is a class to run the OPL election method with the run function. Inherits the LogUtil for logging purposes.

    • Method Detail

      • parseInputFileOPL

        private void parseInputFileOPL(java.lang.String fileLocation)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Parses the file specified at the filename and creates the Ballot and Candidate and Party classes from the file. Does preliminary distribution of the Ballots. Reads each line of the file and sets the member variables to specified values and turns the ballot lines into actual Ballot instances.
        Parameters:
        fileLocation - Location of the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • findWinner

        public void findWinner()
        Handles post file parsing election steps. That includes calculating the quota, distributing the seats to the parties and then handling the remaining Ballots and Seats at the end.

      • makeLog

        public void makeLog(int caseNum)
        Specified by:
        makeLog in interface LogUtil

      • run

        public void run()
        Executes an OPL election with the filename stored at input. It parses the file and finds the winners of the election. Then it writes the lines to an audit and summary file and prints a summary to the screen.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
